mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, user_id, r_image, r_name, composition_id, r_type from c_readlog where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into c_readlog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, user_id, r_image, r_name, composition_id, r_type) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{userId}, #{rImage}, #{rName}, #{compositionId}, #{rType})

insert into c_readlog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, user_id, r_image, r_name, composition_id, r_type) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.rImage}, #{entity.rName}, #{entity.compositionId}, #{entity.rType})

insert into c_readlog(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, user_id, r_image, r_name, composition_id, r_type) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.userId}, #{entity.rImage}, #{entity.rName}, #{entity.compositionId}, #{entity.rType})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), user_id = values(user_id), r_image = values(r_image), r_name = values(r_name), composition_id = values(composition_id), r_type = values(r_type)
mapper.update:
update c_readlog
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
user_id = #{userId},
r_image = #{rImage},
r_name = #{rName},
composition_id = #{compositionId},
r_type = #{rType},
where id = #{id}
